original_title: Yoga Link: Hip Helpers with Jill Miller
overview: Join acclaimed yoga teacher Jill Miller for Yoga Link | Hip Helpers, a unique Yoga-based practice specifically designed to break through the weakness and congestion in our hips caused by the unhealthy habits of our modern lifestyles. Unlock the power of your hips and reconnect to the ease and freedom buried within.
tagline: Liberate the Natural Harmony of Your Hips
title: Yoga Link: Hip Helpers with Jill Miller
